icv.dune.desc: Become heavy, and increase your gravity
icv.host.desc: Overall protection at the cost of speed
icv.raiser.desc: Jump boost. No fall damage decrease
icv.silence.desc: Increase damage, but less attack speed
icv.snout.desc: Increase attack speed, but less health
enchantment.icv.gravity_well.desc: Shoot a small projectile that pushes entities away when it hits a surface.
enchantment.icv.rift_ripper.desc: Open a rift and teleport to it, swapping places with anything near it.
enchantment.icv.black_hole.desc: Create a black hole that pulls entities in, causing damage. Can be pulled back or directed.
enchantment.icv.glacial_impasse.desc: Summon a line of ice spikes that follow where you look, damaging entities.
enchantment.icv.divine_smite.desc: Summon a lightning rod that strikes every few seconds, dealing massive damage.
enchantment.icv.volcano.desc: Choose 3 spots, and flames erupt, dealing constant damage in large areas.
enchantment.icv.milky_chrysalis.desc: Gain Elytra flight and a rocket boost for 5 seconds.
enchantment.icv.planar_shift.desc: Create a teleportation circle that moves entities in any direction on reactivation.
enchantment.icv.abyss_omen.desc: Throw a runic stone to summon void damage in an area.
enchantment.icv.immolate.desc: Release a fiery blast that sets entities on fire and causes them to explode when they die.
enchantment.icv.haunt.desc: Summon a beast made from your soul that damages entities it runs into.
enchantment.icv.extinction.desc: Summon an orb that calls down meteors on a spot repeatedly.
enchantment.icv.tempest.desc: Dash through the air up to 3 times.
enchantment.icv.gale.desc: Create a strong wind burst that dashes you and pushes entities.
enchantment.icv.judgement.desc: Leap a long distance and explode upon impact.
enchantment.icv.tsunami.desc: Sweep the ground with a kick that sends waves, knocking back entities.
enchantment.icv.void_wake.desc: Drop void spikes behind you as you sprint and launch them later.
enchantment.icv.hurricane.desc: Lunge forward and perform a spinning kick that damages and knocks back entities.
enchantment.icv.blink.desc: Teleport a few blocks in front of you.
enchantment.icv.surf.desc: Ride a wave that pulls entities along; dismount at any time.
enchantment.icv.stone_caller.desc: Summon a circle of stone spikes where you look.
enchantment.icv.stasis.desc: Freeze non-living entities in place, and release them with momentum when the timer ends.
enchantment.icv.curb_stomp.desc: Jump into the air and slam down, dealing damage in a shockwave.
enchantment.icv.soul_ember.desc: Shoot an ember that bounces back to you and damages anything it touches.
enchantment.icv.finesse.desc: Backflip on hit; huge lunge-strike on activation.
enchantment.icv.burst.desc: Gain attack speed for consecutive hits; launch entities away.
enchantment.icv.volatile.desc: Exploding critical hits; launch an explosive projectile.
enchantment.icv.breakthrough.desc: Disable shields; delete the closest entity after a windup.
enchantment.icv.cascade.desc: Launch upwards on a critical hit; strike down for more damage the higher you are.
enchantment.icv.tungsten_core.desc: Deal extra knockback; sling out a shockwave with massive knockback.
enchantment.icv.viper.desc: Deal extra damage to debuffed targets; launch a poison-spreading serpent.
enchantment.icv.molten.desc: Deal extra damage to burning targets and release burning embers when you attack them.
enchantment.icv.comet_strike.desc: Explosive arrows that grow bigger with damage.
enchantment.icv.gust.desc: Deal more damage to airborne enemies; launch them into the air.
enchantment.icv.kinetic.desc: Gain speed on hit; use all speed buffs to deal extra damage.
enchantment.icv.meathooks.desc: Chain targets on critical hits; pull chained targets together.
enchantment.icv.root.desc: You can't be moved while holding your shield, except by gravity.
enchantment.icv.bulwark.desc: Block an area around you, absorbing damage to entities within it. The shield recharges over time.
enchantment.icv.resolute.desc: Expand your shield's size, increasing its range. If it breaks, you take damage based on how much it absorbed.
enchantment.icv.vanguard.desc: Release a moving shield radius that defends and pushes away projectiles. The shield always goes on cooldown after release.
enchantment.icv.phalanx.desc: Summon 6 large, immovable shields that knock back anything that touches them. They go on cooldown after use.
enchantment.icv.phylactery.desc: Make the target you're looking at invincible while you hold your shield. The shield breaks in one hit. Behaves like a normal shield if no valid target.
enchantment.icv.buckler.desc: Smaller blocking angle but no movement slowdown. The shield has a short cooldown.
enchantment.icv.geyser.desc: Create a geyser that launches entities upwards.
enchantment.icv.whirlpool.desc: Create a vortex that pulls everything to the ground.
enchantment.icv.undertow.desc: Pull yourself toward blocks or entities when right-clicking.
enchantment.icv.upwell.desc: Knock everything away from the impact.
enchantment.icv.cavitation.desc: Pull everything toward the center of the impact.
enchantment.icv.slipstream.desc: Throw yourself instead of the trident, which returns to you later.
enchantment.icv.resonance.desc: Your bow fires automatically based on your movement speed.
enchantment.icv.caltrops.desc: Release caltrops that damage entities when an arrow hits.
enchantment.icv.deflect.desc: Reverse the target's velocity when hit.
enchantment.icv.heliogarchy.desc: Arrows call down beams of sunlight to strike nearby enemies.
enchantment.icv.jet.desc: Make arrows into rockets that push your target.
enchantment.icv.void_caller.desc: Arrows charge up and summon a void tentacle to drag entities into the ground.
enchantment.icv.hailstorm.desc: Shoot a tracker that triggers a hailstorm behind it.
enchantment.icv.quasar.desc: Shoot a damaging ray that destroys enchanted entities.
enchantment.icv.electron.desc: Release a damaging electrical cyclone that returns to you.
enchantment.icv.seismic.desc: Arrows bounce off entities, causing shockwaves when they hit the ground.
enchantment.icv.pulsar.desc: Charge up to shoot a heavy, high-damage shot.
enchantment.icv.supernova.desc: Turn all weapons into explosive projectiles for a short time.
enchantment.icv.independence.desc: Weapons launch themselves toward the nearest entity.
enchantment.icv.soul_stealer.desc: Mark a victim; activate to teleport them to the weapon.
enchantment.icv.magnetized.desc: All weapons return to you; pull any entities they're embedded in.
enchantment.icv.conductor.desc: Weapons are lighter and faster; chain damage between the closest ones.
enchantment.icv.blockade.desc: Create a 3x3x5 barrier; drain health while it's active.
enchantment.icv.shatter.desc: Burst weapons into shards on impact, dealing constant damage.
enchantment.icv.shadowstep.desc: Teleport to your last thrown weapon.
enchantment.icv.miasma.desc: Create a poison radius; activate to expand and disable the weapon.
enchantment.icv.torchblade.desc: Set fire on the ground and entities near the weapon; activate to create a large pillar of fire.
enchantment.icv.disruptor.desc: Release a pulse to push away nearby entities.
enchantment.icv.arcwire.desc: Create an electrical arc between weapons, dealing heavy damage.
enchantment.icv.calderavox.desc: Cannonballs spread fire on impact, growing the radius when damaged.
enchantment.icv.pyrovesicle.desc: Shoot bubbles that home in on entities, dealing large damage.
enchantment.icv.white_hole.desc: Create a white hole that pushes everything away and teleports entities to the last black hole.
enchantment.icv.boulder.desc: Shoot a huge boulder that deals massive damage and can be pushed slowly.
enchantment.icv.hyperlight_crystal.desc: Embed a crystal that explodes when the target dies.
enchantment.icv.blight_catalyst.desc: Shoot toxic sludge that poisons anything it touches and explodes when it contacts fire or explosions.
